EmailTemplate.name: 2019.09.12 - Implied Consent - Top Nav.Implied Consent - Top Nav_v2
EmailTemplate.subject: It's New & It's Here...
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Introducing our new and improved website navigation. Your buying experience at Grand & Toy is easier with these updates. You’ll be able to:
Find what you’re looking for faster than before.
Get better visibility to your personal information.
Get improved access to anything & everything related to your account and ordering preferences.
Need help navigating the changes? No problem. Learn about the changes with our new onboarding guide, which is available as soon as you log in.
Customer Service <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/contact-us.aspx?cmp=EBCUSTOMERCARE2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> Terms & Conditions <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/contact-us.aspx?cmp=EBCUSTOMERCARE2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> Privacy Policy <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/privacy-policy.aspx?cmp=EBPRIVACY2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> View in Web Browser <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Grand & Toy | 200 Aviva Park Drive, Vaughan, ON L4L9C7 | 1 866 391‑8111 . © 2019 Grand & Toy Limited
